rows.text_1: In order to practise giving instructions that work we all need to work on turning our negative instructions into positive ones.
rows.quiz_1_question: Click on each of the negative commands to see how they can be restated as a positive instruction.
rows.quiz_1_option_1_text: "Stop fighting with your siblings over toys!"
rows.quiz_1_feedback_1: "Please take turns with toys! Each of you can have 5 minutes."
rows.quiz_1_feedback_2: "Please speak with a quiet, indoor voice."
rows.quiz_1_feedback_3: "Please keep your food on the plate."
